en: Okay, #NAME. It's time to see how you did.
You made #MONEY_MONTH this month. That's... not enough.

I've thought a lot about this over this past month. And I just - I don't think I can be with you while you're taking such big risks. It just doesn't feel safe to me. So, if this is really something you still want to do... I think we should end this.
I'm so happy for you. As the month went on, I was really struggling... I felt like a terrible partner. It was hard for me to decide whether to put your dreams first, or my mental wellbeing first.
I'm glad that now, I don't have to worry about it. If I get anxious, I'll remind myself you're doing all right.
